short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track any price, of any product, at any store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track the price of *any* product from *any* store with ease.
Unlike other price trackers that are limited to specific sites, our extension works universally!

Once installed, a "Track Price" button will appear next to product prices at any store. Simply click to start tracking. Here's what you get:

❤️ Automatic price monitoring
❤️ Notification when prices drop or products are back in stock (via push or email)
❤️ Handy dashboard to manage your trackers, add product URLs manually, and view price history charts.
❤️ Unlimited, free price tracking. 

Privacy-respecting with no creepy tracking: just the products you submit.

Start counting your saving today!
